extendedInfo.description: Jigsaroid creates jigsaw puzzles from your favorite photos!You can choose a photo from the gallery in your phone, or search from the Internet.Maximum number of pieces is over 1000! so you can play serious puzzles.(*)Of course, you can play a jigsaw puzzle with a smartphone not only with a tablet.You can set the number of pieces as you like, so it can make a simple jigsaw puzzle for children as well as a serious puzzle for adults.You can search photographs with Picasa, Flickr, deviantART or Google Search. A jigsaw of animals such as dogs and cats, a jigsaw of  World Heritage or natural landscape, masterpiece of painting, and cartoon characters, you can create a jigsaw puzzle with your preference image.About permissions* Storage Use for getting image from gallery and saving searched image.* Network communication Use for searching image from the Internet.* Your account Use for Picasa account if you want.* Note:Maximum number of pieces is depends on your terminal's android version and screen size.With Android2.2 or earlier, it is about 500.With Android3.0 or later, it is about 1400.Note:About the feature of image search, it will be disabled if the provider of image search service discontinue or change the service.

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: This app is everything & more than I was looking for! Allows me to do puzzles out of my own gallery, off the internet etc. I love that the pieces are actually a challenge & not 20 pieces like other apps.
reviews.author: Kuhky Ramones

reviews.title: FOUND IT AT LAST!  Best jigsaw
reviews.comment: I since getting new phone I\'ve been searching for ages to use this fantastic jigsaw again,.(\",)so glad I found it now,thanks guys for the best jigsaw on the market 5 stars +
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Abobakeeer
reviews.comment: Thank you for improving this amazing app..it\'s the best puzzle app in android market...could you please make a button to make all pieces around the edge of the picture...much more easier for children to see quickly
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I love this puzzle app. I like doing puzzles with at least a thousand pieces so this is the perfect app. One thing I would change though is being able to zoom in as far as you want. The pieces are so small that I have to look really close. Other than that it is the best. :) I do at least 5 puzzles at a time
reviews.author: Emily Hull

reviews.title: Great puzzle app!
reviews.comment: I love that it can be played one-handed. Degree of difficulty can be easily selected and changed. Really fun.
reviews.author: Kathy K

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Best app! All others I\'ve had the misfortune of downloading have been horrible bloat-ware. This one does everything you hoped the others would. A++
reviews.author: Art Main

reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
reviews.comment: This has a lot of great options and features. I would suggest to make it so random pieces don\'t \"snap in\" when they get to their right spot (except edge pieces) unless there\'s a piece it fits into right next to it. Sometimes I\'ll have random pieces that find their right spot by accident far away from where I\'m working.
reviews.author: Jonah Mueller

reviews.title: My favorite time waster.
reviews.comment: The new devient art option locks up on my android when download is selected. The only way to unlock the app is reboot.
reviews.author: Bernie Simmons

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: All the features of the one we have always played on the PC, but with a tiny Android footprint. If you like puzzles you\'ll love this one.
reviews.author: Reed Swain

reviews.title: Love it!!
reviews.comment: Only wish I could move the tray.   I recommend this app highly.   Lots of fun.   Jackie
reviews.author: jackie stone

reviews.title: A great app
reviews.comment: Great app
reviews.author: Michael Justice

reviews.title: What a wonderful app.
reviews.comment: It really has some intuitive features that seem like no-brainers in hindsight but really improve the experience. This app made me realize that I actually like jigsaw-puzzles, haha.  One feature you might want to consider is adding the choice of cropping pictures yourself when you chose them. And maybe the interface could use a little overhaul. Maybe I could help out? Haha.
reviews.author: Tobias Marquardt

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Is great. Make puzzles from ur favorite pics
reviews.author: Lori Brooks

reviews.comment: I love it!
reviews.author: jackee brisby

reviews.title: Xoom
reviews.comment: Brilliant :-) :-) :-) :-)
reviews.author: Doug Holt

reviews.title: What happened!!???
reviews.comment: This is by far the best puzzle game I\'ve played...........BUT, since the last update it not only force closes it also shuts down my phone, drains the battery and freezes everything at least three times a day....... I know this app is the culprit because when I removed it my phone works fine.... PLEASE FIX!!!!!!
reviews.author: Nathan shogren

reviews.title: Great puzzle app
reviews.comment: Endless possibilities for puzzles as long as you have internet access.  You can choose the piece size to make it more or less difficult.  The picasa link offers tons of great pics for puzzles. Love the sort and tray features so you can get pieces you don\'t want to work with out of the way (start with the edges, etc.) Just one suggestion though:  There is an option in settings where you can pick what a double tap will do.  It would be awesome if a double tap could open the tray.  On Lenovo IdeaPad 9\"
reviews.author: Linzy Packard

reviews.title: Great!!!!!!
reviews.comment: I am a huge fan of jigsaw and i loved SPB Puzzle on windows mobile, and this is almost as good as spb puzzle. But as this is the only real puzzle for android, i love it. One thing though, can you make an option for open a custom image from a .nomedia folder, you know a hidden folder in android gallery?
reviews.author: Oxido Oxidonis

reviews.title: Best features I\'ve found
reviews.comment: I\'ve been looking for a great jigsaw puzzle app, and this has the best balance of features of apps I\'ve seen. There are so many apps calling themselves \"jigsaw\" that are blocks or sliding tiles, but this title won\'t disappoint!
reviews.author: Christopher Newell

reviews.title: Fantastic app
reviews.comment: I\'m completely addicted!
reviews.author: Maggie Houtz
